title: Porthmadog Cob Walk Route

images.title: The Cob / y Cob, Porthmadog by Arthur C Harris, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: The Cob

images.title: mattbuck (category), CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Porthmadog & Cob

description: This walk takes you across the Porthmadog Cob in the Gwynedd town of Porthmadog. The cob take you across the Glaslyn estuary and Traeth Mawr on a shared cycling and walking path. There's lovely views across the estuary with the option of continuing to nearby Portmeirion . There's also views of the Ffestiniog Railway which passes along the cob.
